description:
4-2 范本随时用！ 我要退休了

写信 刪除 回复 寄件者： mpan
Date: December 18th , 2015
From: mpan@jjj.com
To: all@bbb.com
Subject: Announcing my Retirement

Dear all,
All good things must come to an end. I am retiring and leaving this company.
I will enjoy looking back on the past years and reliving all the invaluable memories I gained when working with you. I would like to deliver my heartfelt thanks to all who have shown me your guidance, support and assistance in the last 40 years.

It has been a pleasure to work with every one of you. I consider myself very lucky to have been coworkers with you all, and I know that we’ll continue to be friends for a very, very long time.
Attached is my personal contact information.

Keep in touch and I wish all of you a promising future!

Warm regards,
Mike Pan

亲爱的同事们：
天下无不散之筵席！我要退休，离开公司了。
我将会很享受回首过去这些年，重温与大家共事的珍贵回忆。我在这里衷心地感谢大家在过去4 0年曾给我的指导、支持与协助。
和你们每个人共事是非常开心的事。我觉得自己能够与你们成为同事是非常幸运的，而我知道我们会一直都是好朋友。
随信附上我的个人联络信息。
保持联络，并祝福大家都拥有美好的未来！

献上最诚挚的祝福。
迈克·潘

翻开就用！单词充电站
1 deliver v. 发出；提出
2 heartfelt adj. 衷心的；真诚的
3 show v. 表现；展示
4 guidance n. 指导
5 attach v. 附上
6 promising adj. 有希望的；有前途的
7 future n. 未来
